title: Is there any API to add a font to SkiaSharp?
body:
Is there a way to load a font using stream to skia to use it without installing the font in a machine?

There is a way to add font streams in PrivateFontCollection in case of GDI+.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
As @neodynamic says, the best way is to use `SKTypeface.FromStream` to load arbitrary typefaces, but there are also `FromFile` if you have access to the filesystem and it is a file.
One other thing to not is that these objects are immutable, so you can create them and then just re-use them all over. The `FromFamilyName` overloads can only access the fonts installed into the system.
